com.nequissimus.university.k1584.logic.pnml

Class PetrinetToMarkup

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nequissimus.university.k1584.logic.pnml.PetrinetToMarkup

  •  class PetrinetToMarkup
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that can turn Petri net elements into PNML.
